text: (innum) tankal virumpatavaikalai (pen makkalai) allahvukku untenru (karpanaiyaka) erpatuttukirarkal. Niccayamakat tankalukku (itanal) nanmaiye kittumena avarkalutaiya navukal poyyuraikkinran niccayamaka avarkalukku (naraka) nerupput tan irukkiratu innum, niccayamaka avarkal atil murpatuttappatuvarkal enpatilum cantekamillai
